Class Device<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.om2m.ipe.smart_twin.model.Device<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the device states.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Door, Light, Window

    public abstract class Device<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes a generic device.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Dr. Nicolas Verstaevel - nicolasv@uow.edu.au
